request.description:
## 'Remove Configuration' API not working.

> Issue reproducible on below camera models:  
> \-Bosch DINION 6000HD

Reproduce steps:

*   command -add configuration -
*   Verify with 'getProfiles' command - new configuration added successfully. - curl -X GET [http://localhost:59882/api/v2/device/name/Bosch-DINION-IP-starlight-6000-HD-00075fd8-7c31-317c-d85f-0700075fd85f/Media2Profiles](http://localhost:59882/api/v2/device/name/Bosch-DINION-IP-starlight-6000-HD-00075fd8-7c31-317c-d85f-0700075fd85f/Media2ProfilesNow)
*   [Now](http://localhost:59882/api/v2/device/name/Bosch-DINION-IP-starlight-6000-HD-00075fd8-7c31-317c-d85f-0700075fd85f/Media2ProfilesNow) execute this Api to remove the newly added configuration
    

Executed successfully - but not removed properly verify with Get-profiles command again.
